adjective.description: Relating to or characteristic of the English playwright and poet Christopher Marlowe or his works.
Relating to the view that Christopher Marlowe wrote the plays attributed to Shakespeare.
examples: the Marlovian theory was reinvented by a determined Broadway press agent

noun.description: A student or admirer of the works of the English playwright and poet Christopher Marlowe.
examples: I have been privileged to benefit from the advice of some excellent Marlovians

noun.description: A supporter of the view that Christopher Marlowe wrote the plays attributed to Shakespeare.
examples: the Marlovians contend that Christopher Marlowe faked his own death
